Title: Duck and Cover
Writer: Philip K. Dick (based on the book by), Frank Spotnitz (developed by), Erik Oleson, Rick Cleveland, Joe Kawasaki (staff writer)
Actors: Alexa Davalos, Rupert Evans, Luke Kleintank, DJ Qualls
Plot: Joe learns a truth about his past that makes him question everything. The rift between Frank and Ed widens as Frank is drawn further into the Resistance. In order to assure her safety, Juliana must betray someone close to her.
